item.title: Wolves in the Shooting Range (Волки в тире)
item.description: War Title track from the album (YouTube, Bandcamp, Spotify) released in 2023. Featuring девять песен о войне, nine songs about war, с ее похоронами в финале, with its funeral in the finale (Meduza 2023). Video clip by Какой-то либерал, 2023 Lyrics, lyrics with translation
